l:dependency.name: artifact-promotion
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin promotes an artifact by moving it from an staging repository to a release repository. More info to come.

l:dependency.name: Maven Repository Metadata Model
l:dependency.l:description: Per-directory local and remote repository metadata.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Maven Builder Support
l:dependency.l:description: Support for descriptor builders (model, setting, toolchains)

l:dependency.name: Aether Transport File
l:dependency.l:description: A transport implementation for repositories using file:// URLs.

l:dependency.name: jersey-core
l:dependency.l:description: Jersey is the open source (under dual CDDL+GPL license) JAX-RS (JSR 311) production quality Reference Implementation for building RESTful Web services.

l:dependency.name: Maven Model Builder
l:dependency.l:description: The effective model builder, with inheritance, profile activation, interpolation, ...

l:dependency.name: Maven Model
l:dependency.l:description: Model for Maven POM (Project Object Model)

l:dependency.name: Apache HttpCore
l:dependency.l:description: HttpComponents Core (blocking I/O)

l:dependency.name: Aether Transport HTTP
l:dependency.l:description: A transport implementation for repositories using http:// and https:// URLs.

l:dependency.name: Aether SPI
l:dependency.l:description: The service provider interface for repository system implementations and repository connectors.

l:dependency.name: jersey-client
l:dependency.l:description: Jersey is the open source (under dual CDDL+GPL license) JAX-RS (JSR 311) production quality Reference Implementation for building RESTful Web services.

l:dependency.name: Maven Artifact
l:dependency.l:description: Maven is a software build management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model: builds, dependency management, documentation creation, site publication, and distribution publication are all controlled from the declarative file. Maven can be extended by plugins to utilise a number of other development tools for reporting or the build process.

l:dependency.name: Aether Implementation
l:dependency.l:description: An implementation of the repository system.

l:dependency.name: Plexus :: Component Annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Plexus Component "Java 5" Annotations, to describe plexus components properties in java sources with standard annotations instead of javadoc annotations.

l:dependency.name: Aether Transport Wagon
l:dependency.l:description: A transport implementation based on Maven Wagon.

l:dependency.name: Aether API
l:dependency.l:description: The application programming interface for the repository system.

l:dependency.name: Plexus Interpolation API
l:dependency.l:description: The Plexus project provides a full software stack for creating and executing software projects.

l:dependency.name: Apache HttpClient
l:dependency.l:description: HttpComponents Client

l:dependency.name: Maven Wagon API
l:dependency.l:description: Maven Wagon API that defines the contract between different Wagon implementations

l:dependency.name: Aether Connector Basic
l:dependency.l:description: A repository connector implementation for repositories using URI-based layouts.

l:dependency.name: Aether Utilities
l:dependency.l:description: A collection of utility classes to ease usage of the repository system.

l:dependency.name: Maven Aether Provider
l:dependency.l:description: Extensions to Aether for utilizing Maven POM and repository metadata.

l:dependency.name: Plexus Common Utilities
l:dependency.l:description: A collection of various utility classes to ease working with strings, files, command lines, XML and more.
